Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal for Germany within seven seconds of kick-off.
Kai Havertz scored Germany's second goal in the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: This was Didier Deschamps' 150th game managing Les Bleus.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans at the Groupama Stadium in Lyon chanted for changes, but even when they did come, they were ineffective.
Others: Toni Kroos made his return to international football.
Lucas Hernandez and Ousmane Dembélé were particularly influential for France.
